plugin.name: Grab
plugin.author: Nick Gammon
plugin.purpose: Grabs a MUSH attribute for editing
plugin.description:
This lets you edit a MUSH attribute in the command window, and then send it back to the MUSH.
Usage -----
grab item/attribute
eg. grab me/describe
The plugin will send: @pemit/silent me=password &%2 %1=[get(%1/%2)]
It awaits a response, and then upon receipt places it into the command window for editing. Make your changes and press <enter>
Grab:help <-- This help screen

muclient.script: Sub OnPluginInstall world.setvariable "password", world.getuniqueid End Sub
Sub OnHelp (sName, sLine, wildcards) World.Note World.GetPluginInfo (World.GetPluginID, 3) End Sub
